content: following steps: a. Click FTP Source. b. Enter the IP address (or hostname) of your FTP server into the Host computer field. c. Enter the FTP User ID and Password into those fields. d. Enter the FTP server directory path that contains 720vm.ins into the File location field. In this example, it is /ftp/zvm/720/cpdvd. e. Click OK. Figure 5-9 HMC FTP Load from Removable Media or Server window 7. Load the RAMDISK: If you are installing from DVDs: The first disc must be in the HMC DVD drive. Click Hardware Management Console CD/DVD-ROM only. Chapter 5. Installing z/VM 113 a. From the Load from Removable Media or Server panel, the directory that contains the file 720VM.INS is selected. Click OK. Figure 5-10 HMC FTP load - Select software to install b. From the Confirm action window, click OK c. From the Continue action window, click Yes. d. You see the Disruptive Task Confirmation: Load from CD-ROM, DVD, or Server Progress window (see Figure 5-11). You might be prompted for the password,
